task_requirements:
Review the Reporters module implementation.

**Files to Review in core/typescript/reporters/:**
- types.ts - Reporter type definitions
- journey-reporter.ts - mapTestToJourney, groupTestsByJourney, calculateJourneyStatus
- artk-reporter.ts - ARTKReporter class, generateARTKReport, writeARTKReport
- artifacts.ts - saveScreenshot with PII masking option
- masking.ts - maskPiiInScreenshot function
- index.ts - Barrel export
- __tests__/journey-reporter.test.ts - Journey mapping tests
- __tests__/masking.test.ts - PII masking tests

**Validation:**
- FR-029 to FR-033 compliance
- 37/37 tests passing
- Journey mapping and PII masking working correctly
